scripts.release: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && changelog -p && npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && changelog -m && npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm run build && changelog -M && npm version major && npm run release
